_header: When all a kingdom gathered is
Subjects: princes, advice to; kings of England, exhortation to; political poems
_description: Exhortation to the rulers of England — twenty-one 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodDig102.First Lines:
Whanne alle a kyngdom gadrid ysseIn goddis lawe by on
                    assent…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Do so now ȝe wynne ȝow prysAnd heuene blisse for
                    ȝoure dede
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 55-60.
